name: Bobby en Busca de Fama
description:
STORY 

[EN] The little Bobby has a dream, be famous like his idol and the only idea he had to fulfill his dream is to ruin the show of other artists and steal their fame.

[ES] El pequeño Bobby tiene un sueño, ser famoso como su ídolo y la única idea que tuvo para cumplirlo es arruinando el show de otros artistas y robarles la fama.

ORIGIN OF THE GAME

[EN] In the 2017 in the Facebook page of @ZuperHugoTime it was created a serie of post where together with the subscribers created an idea of a videogame. The story of the game was created in this way, later to give the game a little more depth, more enemies and a good gameplay was created. Finally, after 3 year (not exactly working on the project) the game is finished! <3 I hope you enjoy it!

[ES] En el 2017 en la página de facebook de @ZuperHugoTime se creó una serie de post donde junto a los suscriptores se creó una idea de un videojuego. La historia del juego se creó de esta manera, posteriormente para darle un poco más de profundidad al juego, se crearon más enemigos y una buena jugabilidad. Finalmente, después de 3 años (no exactamente trabajando en el proyecto) ¡El juego esta terminado! <3 ¡Espero que lo disfrutes!

CONTROLS


Arrows - Movement

Z - Jump/Select

X - Shoot

** Also you can use  Xbox or NES usb controller to play the game **

SOFTWARE USED

>> Unity - All game

>> Affinity Designer - Art and game design

>> Bosca Ceoil - Music

SOCIAL MEDIA

All the music and trailers are available on Youtube, also you can follow me in all my social network and see the progress of my work ;)
